description: DeploymentTemplate is the Schema for the deploymenttemplates API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: DeploymentTemplateSpec defines the desired state of a DeploymentTemplate resource.

parameters.description: Parameters is the ARM JSON parameters for the template.

providerConfig.description: ProviderConfig specifies the scopes for resources.

repository.description: Repository is the git repository that the Bicep manifests are stored in.

template.description: Template is the ARM JSON manifest that defines the resources to deploy.

status.description: DeploymentTemplateStatus defines the observed state of a DeploymentTemplate resource.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this DeploymentTemplate.

operation.description: Operation tracks the status of an in-progress provisioning operation.

operationKind.description: OperationKind describes the type of operation being performed.

resumeToken.description: ResumeToken is a token that can be used to resume an in-progress provisioning operation.

outputResources.description: OutputResources is a list of the resourceIDs that were created by the template on the last deployment.

phrase.description: Phrase indicates the current status of the Deployment Template.

statusHash.description: StatusHash is a hash of the DeploymentTemplate's state (template, parameters, and provider config).
